topic.title: ZeroNet is FBI honeypot.
topic.body:
Another take? The FBI regularly weeds out anyone with intelligence. Most FBI agents want to keep their bullshit jobs. So calling attention to Arabs not wishing to land aircraft is a very career limiting move. "White nationalism" is under scrutiny ONLY because those people tend not to blow themselves up. Change that, and those FBI agents will develop a sudden overwhelming interest in jaywalkers. Or those who fail to return library books.

Quote taken from [this](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DdPHedr5Tz55EtQWxqvsbEXPdc4uCVi9D/?:users/13E1NfoEM9eYfxk3mZQTLW5qYBekTp5W7v:pol:0).

1589945996_1A8k2FFyono2dUQWKaRzsRvbXguVu.body:
Love you guys and gals for attitude. I honestly think you are fucking great for trying. We are simply not sly and sophisticated enough. Also it's best to hit your enemy out of surprise. Our enemy is obsessively watching us here. I speak code almost. 

Zeronet is the  most exciting thing i have ever came across. But we are smart and can spend several ours figuring out what can be done here, the potential. There were people here in bigger numbers in the past. They disappeared. I am slowly starting to see why and am wiling to undertake great long term work to change that. In the past the problem was trying to work with people with ego issues. A pack of vicious ones is needed. No goofiness. You get me?

@sabutai you are the samurai

Can't possibly say if this one particular thing will work or not. And yet, an open mind. I allow and approve of the following methods: deception* , lying, provocation, exploitation, use of false identity ... and it develops like the series in mathematics. I also want you all to take great pleasure every time you use those. Remember that your enemies have no problem directly cutting communication between people. Fact: they violate private accounts and secretly change settings, delete and hide messages (essentially delete) and give fake answers and results while charging money for it. To say that surely people simply don't care is not true! 

I have seen with my own eyes entire online communities obliterated mercilessly in cold blood. Those people will hack or blackmail without a flinch. 

This is all a fair game.   

However nobody should be stupid enough to just openly walk around with their tag on the back and make any of such things. Under the radar is the key.

* *examples click bait, ambiguous statements, double speech.
.... and you can also zeromail me. I zeromail people here and they either have no habit or do not want to use it.

> [aassddff](#comment_48_1A8k2FFyono2dUQWKaRzsRvbXguVuXQHYS): For what? For doing propaganda for Zeronet?

And what do you think? Do say.
You are absolutely right about the users.json! (speaking from experience)

> [aassddff](#comment_49_1A8k2FFyono2dUQWKaRzsRvbXguVuXQHYS): I do not aprove of lies and deceiving. (...) from stumbling upon bad stuff.

Good you spoke up. I used be like you in the past. Upright straight shooting person. That was until I found out INTEL is mass raping billions of computers with their secret ALL_ACCESS_MEMORY inside chip system never mentioned on packaging or manual and how Google YouTube deletes millions of files a minute in secret putting 'a liberal smile' to all that.  Our parents are by most part white european decent christians and were brainwashed to be 'God fearing' never lie never steal never lust people and work for every piece of bread you eat. Do not murder - that was upgraded to being docile loss accepting having a dreadful fear of any killing*. Our enemies have a culture of despising hard honest work and entitled themselves to running multi-generational big business on deceit and dishonest speculation. All that with religious zeal. They rape and mutilate their children and engage in international human and organ trade. 

There is no point whatsoever in inviting people to platform that is glitching and failing. They will go away. We have to investigate what features are missing and what needs fixing. Easy to say harder to do. This has to be constantly dealt with and I feel I have a duty to help. 

People worked hard in the past to promote zeronet and sifted through the many weeds and brought the wheat here. Those people just suddenly disappeared. Skip back the 1st paragraph to get a hint what could have caused it. So like in the parable the birds came and ate them up. The soil was good. 

There are issues with zeronet glitching weird shit happens here. I am not blind I see people complaining about basic things mysteriously not loading here on zeronet. I have recorded bizarre zeronet behavior in person. I know of people who got their computers disabled because they figured stuff out and started sharing it openly. You do understand some people will simply be unable to continue after shit like that!? 

Where is nofish? Who is making the latest zeronet versions? I mean he does TED talk, audio interview, seems a normal cool guy passionate about work and zeronet and suddenly 2 years ago he  goes hiding?  Folks this shit is serious.

I was never meant to be on zeronet. NEVER!!!! The CIA and alike got rid of a user from a service and somehow missed a message to me with a contact that was the only way I could ever end up on zeronet. Fluke or glitch is not the word! 

I was recently totally convinced any attempt to promote zeronet on likes of facebook is a complete waste of time as AI will eat any growth. And then I was convinced it is actually worth trying. The numbers are however still shitty.

The vast majority of people on mass social media are not fit mentally to have any useful and beneficial input anyway. They are new world order meat suits and are proud of it. We only want top half of say 110-130 IQ or higher. These are huge numbers!  (market in greedy banker mind). Using trickery and click bait to get bigger numbers of followers only to skillfully and in a sly manner advertise zeronet to be then likely banned to cause a streissand  effect is something that I totally approve of. I approve of it.

I know of bad karma. I more than believe it. Top elites also believe it and always make sure people openly agree to terms and conditions and willingly engage in their products so they do not die from all their deception. I do not seek to satisfy my greed. I only want zeronet in whatever version or form to be big and strong enough so evil fuckers can never fully censor people from freely exchanging crucial information that can protect and save them. (I know libremesh needed too) 

I hate fascism or forcing people into anything. I believe we should form into groups that promote zeronet the way they see fit and compare who is getting best results. No point in doing that from same IP so we can be seen here by enemy spies.

And again, a circle, we need to have zeronet stability at least somewhat under control right now. Help and assistance to new users is essential. Of course there will be trolls send here who will be like 'Hello... CHILD PORN, You censor and persecute people too? <crying like a bby for show>

* *And, to all, PLEASE do not try to dismiss by pointing some exceptions in mentality or racial aspect in individual cases. We all know those exceptions only confirm the general rule.
